author: daxian-dbw
body:
After installing the AppImage (run it and click OK when prompting for desktop integration), the icon shown up in GNOME search is not the PowerShell icon, but like this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/127450/31925010-7110c6e0-b83a-11e7-9f08-658f47c67322.png)
title: The icon of powershell AppImage is not set properly
